javax.servlet.jsp.tagext

Class TagExtraInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagExtraInfo

  • public class TagExtraInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Optional class provided by the tag library author to describe additional translation-time information not described in the TLD.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      • getVariableInfo

        public VariableInfo[] getVariableInfo(TagData data)
        Information on scripting variables defined by the tag associated with this TagExtraInfo instance.
        Parameters:
        data - TagData instance
        Returns:
        variableinfo defined in the tag data

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(TagData data)
        Indicates whether the data is valid.

      • validate

        public ValidationMessage[] validate(TagData data)
        Validate the data. Prefer this method over isValid(javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagData) as it gives more detail.
        Returns:
        null or a zero length array if there are no errors, an array of messages otherwise
        Since:
        2.0

      • setTagInfo

        Set the value of TagInfo.
        Parameters:
        tagInfo - the TagInfo value
